revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Hoenn |image = [[File:Victory Road Hoenn.png|250px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Victory Road Hoenn. |tokens = 37,000 |location = North of Ever Grande City. }} '''Victory Road Hoenn''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 360,000 |- | Hariyama (Boss) || 1,300,000 |- | Lairon (Boss) || 1,300,000 |- | Medicham (Boss) || 1,300,000 |- | Graveler (Boss) || 1,300,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Golbat * Whismur * Loudred * Makuhita * Aron * Mawile * Meditite * Geodude * Goldeen * Magikarp * Barboach * Whiscash * Hariyama (boss) * Lairon (boss) * Medicham (boss) * Graveler (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
